features: GENTLE FORMULA- A lathering men's face wash specially formulated for sensitive skin.
REMOVE EXCESS DIRT & OIL-Men's Face Wash that gently removes excess dirt and oil, leaving skin feeling clean and refreshed.
NO-NONSENSE— Clear, synthetic fragrance-free solution (none of those fake scents).
Part of the new Edge+ grooming and facial care system. Clear, no-nonsense solutions that give every man the tools they need–to always keep their edge.
body.description: Find the right tool for the job. Upgrade your grooming routine with the Edge+ Sensitive Men's Face Wash. This lathering men's face wash is synthetic fragrance-free, and specially formulated for sensitive skin. The clear, no-nonsense solution gently removes excess dirt and oil, leaving your face feeling clean and refreshed. Pair with the Edge+ Face Moisturizer for the ultimate experience. Edge+ is proud to deliver an experience that matters, with absolute quality and unwavering consistency.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gently cleanses sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: This face wash is geared towards individuals with sensitive skin. My husband has been using this face wash and has not experienced any sort of reaction to it so far. He deals with dry skin, so finding a product that doesn't create an adverse reaction is always good.The cleanser is clear and provides a rich sudsy lather. It's predominantly fragrance free, but not totally. I went to smell it while it was in the tube, and I detected a very faint scent of some sort. It basically smelled like your typical cleanser, but very muted. I don't think it would affect anyone with sensitivities to smells, but everyone is different, so that could vary. However, after washing off the cleanser, no scent was detected on the skin.In all honesty, I think that this face wash could be used by both male and female. Regardless, it seems to be working for my husband, and it seems to do a great job of serving its primary purpose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle and effective
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my 15-year-old son who has sensitive skin, and it's been great! This face wash works wonders for him without drying out or irritating his skin. The fragrance-free formula is exactly what we needed, and it leaves his skin feeling clean and refreshed. Plus, at such an affordable price, it's a steal! Highly recommend for anyone with sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A gentle cleaner
reviews.reviewText: Grew up using edge products, but never a face wash. I have sensitive skin, so I gave this a try.It is fragrance free and produces a nice lather. It rinses clean, and does not leave my skin dry.I have really oily skin and my daily cleaner is Clinique liquid facial soap. In comparison, I prefer my normal soap as I can feel the difference. It removes more oil than this one.Not a keeper for me, however I would be happy to recommend to guys who don't get too oily.It does wash my beard nicely though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice Face Cleansing Wash
reviews.reviewText: This cleansing wash is a good add to keep your face clean. It is easy to apply as well as wash off. Although it does leave the face a little dry after use, it does a thorough job of cleaning dirt and oil from the skin. The face wash is a very good price compared to other options, but it does have a slight chemical smell to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Almost disconcertingly unscented
reviews.reviewText: I know it says it's fragrance-free, but it's really almost startling just how fragrance-free this stuff is - I don't think I've ever used a face wash that's truly completely odorless before, so it takes a bit of getting used to.That aside, it's a very nice face wash. My skin feels clean and moisturized, and I didn't experience any irritation. It doesn't really work up much of a lather, but it's thick enough that that's not an issue. I'm quite happy with it and will continue to use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and value
reviews.reviewText: The face wash starts out with the consistency of thickened vegetable oil that spreads easily and lathers fairly well on wet skin -- though not as much as shown in the marketing images -- before rinsing away cleanly. I'm actually impressed at how well it cleanses oily skin, leaving my face looking and feeling much cleaner; even the sensation of a light breeze across the skin is different/improved after usage. And props for having a foil seal on the tube, something many manufacturers omit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Truly unscented & great for sensitive skin!
reviews.reviewText: My husband has used Edge products for years so I was excited for him to try this new Edge+ skincare line! First, this face wash truly is unscented and great for my husband's sensitive skin. While it says it's for men, I borrowed it in the shower, and it worked well to remove my makeup and clean my face as well.The price is affordable and I think it works well at removing dirt and oil without overdrying it or irritating the skin. I think we'll continue to buy this product - but now we're curious to try the other products in the Edge+ skincare system, especially the post shave lotions!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Face Wash
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my husband that has sensitive skin and so far he really likes it. The face wash has done well regarding sensitivity. Definitely recommend this face wash!
